summary: Provides a callable component that injects simulated user interactions (e.g., click points) into each iteration of an Ignite engine for Deepgrow training or evaluation, applying optional transforms, respecting a maximum interaction count, and storing interaction probabilities under a configurable key.
business_intent: Automates the generation of realistic interaction data to train and assess interactive medical image segmentation models, enabling scalable, reproducible model development without manual user input.
